p: The estimation of health impact costs, (Tables 1 and 2) comprising medical costs and productivity losses, were based on the cost-of-illness (COI) analysis [ 28] in which the burden of a disease on society is estimated in financial terms using both direct and indirect measures. Direct costs consist mainly of medical care, both inpatient and outpatient, and are estimated using market prices.
